reviews.text:
Recently, we went to Plate & Palette for my son birthday brunch.
They love the cafe a lot as there are swing sitting area where my kids love it very much.
They also have varieties of food to choose from as well.
Most importantly, they are affordable & generous portion.

We enjoy our meal at Plate & Palette. We even celebrate my son birthday by ordering waffle with ice cream for him.
Highly recommend.

Stumbled upon this cozy spot and it turned out to be a real hidden gem! The swing table added such a fun and unique touch—definitely a hit with the kids. The kid’s meal was well-portioned and delicious, and judging from the happy giggles and clean plate, it was a winner.

Tried the fusion pasta and a couple of western dishes—everything was hearty, flavourful, and comforting. Great for both adults and little ones.

The gelato and waffle combo was absolutely divine. Warm, fluffy waffles paired with rich, creamy gelato—just perfect.

Very cosy and family friendly cafe. The chicken chop is on point and my girls love their kid meal pasta. Waffle ice cream is a must. Wanna thanks the staff for offering umbrella for us due to the heavy rain.

The cafe is perfectly situated with ample parking available just outside. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, with a clean and well-maintained environment. The prices are reasonably priced, offering great value for the portions served. It's an ideal spot to catch up with friends or family over a delightful brunch!

savoury their rosti, western, pasta and waffles. They even have a unique swing table as well, my little's one love it so much~

If you are a tomyum lover's, recommend their tomyum cream for you, the fragrance of the spice and chewy spaghetti with blue swimmer crab meat, prawns, white clams and squid.

Their fried chicken was tender and savoury with waffles is good. Last, ended our meal with waffle chocolate :)
